style-loader
å®‰è£…

ç”¨æ³• Usage
å»ºè®®ç»“åˆä½¿ç”¨ style-loader å’Œ css-loader
component.js
import style from './file.css'

webpack.config.js
{
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/,
        use: [
          { loader: 'style-loader' },
          { loader: 'css-loader' },
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
